but these terms are at least a bit misleading since as far as the computer is
concerned the symbols don’t symbolizeanything or representanything. They
are just formal counters.
The computer attaches no meaning, interpretation, or content to the for-
mal symbols; and quacomputer it couldn’t, because if we tried to give the
computer an interpretation of its symbols we could only give it more unin-
terpreted symbols. The interpretation of the symbols is entirely
